attributes.additional_details: Covid cases are minimal now compared to the peak. There are advances in treatments and drugs and the virus can be managed. Only a handful are seriously ill or dying.  The Govt are installing fear unnecessarily in order to extert control over their citizens.  This is wrong. The country cannot stop living to protect a tiny minority.  The economy and peoples mental health have to now take priority.
attributes.background: Stop the rule of 6.  Rules are inconsistent and make no sense.  30 family and friends gathering for a meal is no more dangerous than 30 people gathering to shoot wildlife.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550653
